title: raritycheck
author: raritycheck
content: TIME LEFT: END TIME: June 11, 2023, 09:00 PM NYC2022 RC VIBGYOR - orange sets    Lot 1- Set #85 (1 silver, 1 gilded, comes with certificates)Lot 2- Set #86 (1 silver, 1 gilded, comes with certificates)Lot 3- Set #90 (1 silver, 1 gilded, comes with certificates)Lot 4- Set #91 (1 silver, 1 gilded, comes with certificates)Total mintage: 100 sets.   BID is for unloaded coins. Optionally, coins can be loaded before posting For each lot, starting bid: 0.014BTC    MINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.001 BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places** **Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 10 minutes will extend the auction 10 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 10 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 10 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING
